Name: San Francisco
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Long, fruity, slightly sweet and vodka-laced.
History: Unknown, but almost certainly not originally from the city of San Francisco in California. It certainly originated before 1992, as that's when I first encountered this cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of San Francisco contains 246 calories
